input.sentences: today was a great day to visit the water .
the water was nice and clam until..
a storm started coming in | then the waves started crashing against the rocks .
after the storm arrived the water calmed down again and we enjoyed the sound the rain made on the water .
the sky became blue and clear after the short summer storm passed .
output.sentences: When we went to the beach today the water started calm and the day was bright.
The water glimmered in the nice sunshine and everything was calm at the start.
Then the waves picked up and a storm started.
The water became disturbed by the storm and the sound was entrancing.
Good thing summer is fickle, because soon the storm abated and lovely blue sky came out again.
